channel.title: MoparScape isn't working (AGAIN!)
channel.description:
okay now it was working for like 2 weeks now and now i get a server error message when i try to use compiler... Error: Unable to startup listener on 45394 - port already in use? Then when i try to use MoparScape to connect to server after news it says: Server: Error: Unable to startup listener on 45394 - port already in use?
How do i fix this to play Mopar again?

item.title: MoparScape isn't working (AGAIN!)
item.dc:creator: @Xx_HaKu_xX Xx HaKu xX
item.description:
@Xx_HaKu_xX wrote:

Just change the port to like “5555”
open up your server.java and press ctrl-f and search for

	public static int serverlistenerPort =

and change the port from 43594 to 5555 or 8080 ect.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape isn't working (AGAIN!)
item.dc:creator: @azngamerxx azngamerxx
item.description:
@azngamerxx wrote:

Question 2:
Uhh… how?

Next time try to tell me how i do things because im not a wiz at doing things b/c im lazy

Did you know that you can take your HybridScape character file and copy it to another server go into characters and replace it (or add) with your lv 126 char from HybridScape

because you computer is set to that for some of your programs you can just find a tut on switching ports and change mopar to port 50000 or something like that
